movie_title: High heels: fashion or oppression? 6 Minute English
introduction: Improve your English vocabulary and speaking with 6 Minute English! Uncomfortable and unsafe to wear

vocabulary.definition: when you are forced to do something by someone more powerful
vocabulary.example: The government's oppression of its citizens led to protests and demonstrations.

vocabulary.definition: the quality of looking fashionable and attractive
vocabulary.example: She exuded glamour in her stunning evening gown.

vocabulary.definition: a great improvement or positive change
vocabulary.example: The new educational program had a transformative impact on the students' academic performance.

vocabulary.definition: belonging to an imaginary world rather than the real world; magical or special
vocabulary.example: The fantasy novel was filled with otherworldly creatures and enchanting landscapes.

vocabulary.definition: making someone do something to give them less authority or power
vocabulary.example: The strict rules imposed on the employees showed a clear sense of subordination in the workplace.
The artist's flamboyant paintings stood out in the gallery with their vibrant hues and bold designs.
